@1@ The type {{tt|std::sorted_unique_t}} can be used in the function's (including constructor's) parameter list to match the intended tag.

@2@ The corresponding {{tt|std::sorted_unique}} instance of {{v|1}} is a disambiguation tag that can be passed to the functions of {{lc|std::flat_map}} and {{lc|std::flat_set}} to indicate that the input range or container is sorted (with respect to the comparator used in flat container adaptor) and all elements of such container or range are unique.

===Standard library===
The following standard library container adaptors use {{v|1,2}} as disambiguation tags:
{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc inc|cpp/container/dsc flat_map}}
{{dsc inc|cpp/container/dsc flat_set}}
{{dsc end}}
